147.movie_name: Man Who Knew Too Little, The (1997)
147.movie_plot: Wallace Ritchie is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assassinate international leaders at a banquet.

140.movie_plot: Agent 007 is assigned to hunt for a lost British encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

158.movie_plot: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding killer and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

165.movie_plot: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

146.movie_plot: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

162.movie_plot: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

172.movie_name: Taking of Pelham One Two Three, The (1974)
172.movie_plot: In New York, armed men hijack a subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

139.movie_plot: A man who works for 'The Party' (an all powerful empire led by a man known only as 'Big Brother') begins to have thoughts of rebellion and love for a fellow member. Together they look to help bring down the party.

171.movie_plot: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

149.movie_plot: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

135.movie_plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

153.movie_plot: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

142.movie_name: Man with the Golden Gun, The (1974)
142.movie_plot: James Bond is led to believe that he is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.

150.movie_plot: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

137.movie_name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)
137.movie_plot: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

141.movie_plot: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

152.movie_plot: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

160.movie_plot: When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

167.movie_name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes (1972)
167.movie_plot: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.

154.movie_plot: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina winter house after the funeral of one of their friends.

144.movie_plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

148.movie_plot: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

169.movie_plot: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

155.movie_plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

170.movie_plot: The sensuous wife of a lunch wagon proprietor and a rootless drifter begin a sordidly steamy affair and conspire to murder her Greek husband.

161.movie_plot: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

131.movie_plot: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

132.movie_plot: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

156.movie_plot: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous facade, there is revealed a person of intelligence and sensitivity.

151.movie_plot: Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.

174.movie_name: Gods Must Be Crazy II, The (1989)
174.movie_plot: Xixo is back again. This time, his children accidentally stow away on a fast-moving poachers' truck, unable to get off, and Xixo sets out to rescue them. Along the way, he encounters a ...

133.movie_plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

145.movie_plot: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

173.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

157.movie_plot: The lives of two struggling musicians, who happen to be brothers, inevitably change when they team up with a beautiful, up-and-coming singer.

134.movie_plot: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

136.movie_plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.

143.movie_plot: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

163.movie_plot: In 1968, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

166.movie_plot: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

50.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

12.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

63.movie_plot: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save his wife Holly Gennaro and several others that were taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

82.movie_plot: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

117.movie_plot: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

118.movie_plot: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

104.movie_plot: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.

41.movie_plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

79.movie_plot: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

2.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

53.movie_plot: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

125.movie_plot: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

49.movie_plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt lead by a seasoned US Marshall.

21.movie_plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

92.movie_plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

26.movie_plot: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.

18.movie_plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

97.movie_plot: The staff of an army hospital in the Korean war find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.

22.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)

34.movie_plot: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.

73.movie_plot: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

28.movie_plot: When C.I.A. Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an I.R.A. assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

114.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

113.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

61.movie_plot: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

9.movie_plot: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

66.movie_plot: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

56.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

69.movie_plot: A group of passengers struggle to survive and escape when their ocean liner completely capsizes at sea.

6.movie_plot: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

52.movie_plot: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

16.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)
16.movie_plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

43.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

11.movie_plot: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

90.movie_plot: Lovers' lives are complicated by city law, feuding faerie royalty, and... love.

45.movie_plot: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer, gets a supremely rare chance to fight heavy-weight champion Apollo Creed in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

110.movie_plot: A group of good-hearted but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.

99.movie_plot: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

129.movie_plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

35.movie_plot: Three trappers protect a British Colonel's daughters in the midst of the French and Indian War.

75.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

100.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

93.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

123.movie_plot: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

42.movie_plot: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

60.movie_plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

57.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

109.movie_plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.
